alert.note: Alert for Prairie; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 26 at 3:46PM MDT until June 26 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of northeast Montana, including the following counties, Prairie and Wibaux. * WHEN...Until 700 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 346 PM MDT, Emergency Management reported heavy rain in the advisory area due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mildred. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
